title: Schedule a Follow-up Appointment
description: A patient is checking out and needs to schedule a 3-month follow-up appointment with their physician.

tasks.description: Identify the patient's record and the provider they need to see.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the patient and the specified physician.

tasks.description: View the provider's schedule to find the next available appointments in approximately three months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds and offers the patient several available time slots.

tasks.description: Book the selected appointment and provide the patient with an appointment reminder card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the appointment and confirms the details with the patient.
